sentences.en: continued efforts to alleviate poverty and raise living standards
sentences.cn: 缓解贫困和提高生活水平的不懈努力

sentences.en: Garvey died in loneliness and poverty.
sentences.cn: 加维在孤独和穷困中死去。

sentences.en: He had broken his vow of poverty.
sentences.cn: 他违背了他安贫乐道的誓言。

sentences.en: Manchester still suffers from urban blight and unacceptable poverty.
sentences.cn: 曼彻斯特仍然受到城区脏乱和严重贫困问题的困扰。

sentences.en: Many mothers and children tumble into poverty after divorce.
sentences.cn: 很多母亲和孩子在离婚后陷入贫困。

sentences.en: Millions of elderly people live in poverty .
sentences.cn: 数百万老年人生活在贫困之中。

sentences.en: Millions of elderly people live in poverty.
sentences.cn: 数百万老年人生活在贫困之中。

sentences.en: Mr Burke, pleading poverty, changed his mind.
sentences.cn: 伯克先生以自己穷为由改变了主意。

sentences.en: Mr Dunn's pleas of poverty are only partly justified.
sentences.cn: 邓恩先生贫穷的托词只是部分成立。

sentences.en: Poverty and bad housing conditions are still very much in evidence.
sentences.cn: 贫困和糟糕的住房条件仍很常见。

sentences.en: Poverty and illiteracy go together with high birth rates.
sentences.cn: 贫困、文盲与高出生率密切相关。

sentences.en: Poverty and unemployment are frustratingly hard to tackle.
sentences.cn: 贫穷和失业是难以解决的问题，这常常让人泄气。

sentences.en: Poverty begets debt.
sentences.cn: 穷则债聚。

sentences.en: Poverty is less of a problem now than it used to be.
sentences.cn: 贫穷问题已较过去有所缓解。

sentences.en: Poverty leads to slums, which are an eyesore and a health hazard.
sentences.cn: 贫困产生了贫民窟，那里不仅有碍观瞻，而且卫生隐患严重。

sentences.en: scenes of abject poverty
sentences.cn: 极度贫困的情景

sentences.en: the causes of urban poverty
sentences.cn: 造成城市贫困的原因

sentences.en: The poverty figures were undoubtedly an embarrassment to the president.
sentences.cn: 贫困数字毫无疑问让总统非常难堪。

sentences.en: They refuse to do anything about the real cause of crime: poverty.
sentences.cn: 他们拒绝采取措施解决引发犯罪的真正问题：贫穷。

sentences.en: Thirteen per cent of the population live below the poverty line.
sentences.cn: 13%的人口生活在贫困线以下。

sentences.en: We need an effective strategy to fight poverty .
sentences.cn: 我们需要制定一个有效的对策来与贫困作斗争。

sentences.en: We need an effective strategy to fight poverty.
sentences.cn: 我们需要制定一个有效的对策来与贫困作斗争。

words.tran_cn: 贫穷,贫困;穷困;困难;饥饿

phrases.tran_cn: 贫困线；贫穷线（指维持一般生活所需收入的最低标准）

trans.tran_en: the situation or experience of being poor
